ch0303_40_poppy/0101_0701_01_10:
I was waiting for you, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="mister" F="miss" ]! I’m so happy to
see you!
ch0303_40_poppy/0101_0701_02_10: My Pokémon and I are pumped!
ch0303_40_poppy/7101_0701_01_10: My Pokémon are super tough, but...
ch0303_40_poppy/7102_0701_01_10:
Oh, ummm... So there’s this thing I saw in a
video once.
ch0303_40_poppy/7102_0701_02_10:
It’s white and stretchy, and you eat it on days
you celebrate stuff.
ch0303_40_poppy/7102_0701_03_10:
They were mashing it just like how Tinkie does
with her hammer!
ch0303_40_poppy/7103_0701_01_10:
The new year is here, and I’m ready for a
fresh start!
ch0303_40_poppy/7103_0701_02_10:
By the way, have you decided on your resolutions
for this year?
ch0303_40_poppy/7103_0701_03_10:
Mine’s to get a sturdy body like my Steel-type
Pokémon!
ch0303_40_poppy/7104_0701_01_10:
Tightening this outfit’s belt helps me feel solid and
focused!
ch0303_40_poppy/7104_0701_02_10:
But everything else flutters around my arms and
legs, so my body feels light and airy!
ch0303_40_poppy/7104_0701_03_10: I might just be able to fly!
ch0303_40_poppy/7105_0701_01_10: Do you think I’m cute, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="mister" F="miss" ]?
ch0303_40_poppy/7105_0701_03_10:
Rika said the same! She told me, “You’re so cute,
I could just eat you up!”
ch0303_40_poppy/1701_0702_01_10: Are you in the mood to celebrate now?
ch0303_40_poppy/2501_0701_01_10:
If you want your Pokémon to Mega Evolve,
I heard you need a strong bond with it—and
a Mega Stone!
ch0303_40_poppy/2501_0701_02_10:
The Terastal phenomenon is so pretty and
powerful, but...
ch0303_40_poppy/2501_0701_03_10:
Mega Evolution is also pretty and powerful, so I
like it too!
ch0303_40_poppy/2501_0702_01_10:
What do you think, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="mister" F="miss" ]? Between Mega
Evolution and Terastallizing...
ch0303_40_poppy/2501_0702_02_10: which do you think is prettier and more powerful?
ch0303_40_poppy/2511_0701_01_10: I’m so glad I came to Pasio!
ch0303_40_poppy/2511_0701_02_10:
I’ve met so many steel-hard Pokémon I couldn’t
have met in Paldea!
ch0303_40_poppy/2511_0701_03_10:
Tinkie’s a bit of a handful, though, ’cause she
always wants to battle.
ch0303_40_poppy/2511_0702_01_10:
Let me know if you ever become friends with
Steel-type Pokémon, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="mister" F="miss" ]!
ch0303_40_poppy/2511_0702_02_10: I’d love to be friends with them, too!
ch0303_40_poppy/3001_0701_01_10:
I got up even earlier than the sun today ’cause I
didn’t wanna miss the sunrise!
ch0303_40_poppy/3003_0701_01_10:
Everybody’s so happy when they celebrate!
It makes me smile too!
ch0303_40_poppy/3005_0701_01_10:
Great job today! I’m a good girl, so I’m gonna go
to bed soon.
